quote-text: Thank you, my cetaceaus friends. Truly, you are the friendliest of sea creatures, after the cuddlefish and the hugtopus.
quote-source: Pip “Put That In The” Bin, A Now Tricky Life Woefully Miseried Up, Bleak Expectations, series 4, episode 5.
tags: A Now Tricky Life Woefully Miseried Up
